LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="8386978cfd8f4de2adbc9373628606da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Phew,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks a billion for rescuing me![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf07"/]Molly[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8386978cfd8f4de2adbc9373628606da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]So check it out...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hopped aboard this tour
to get fresh content for my videos.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But
then I dropped my camera.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yikes, right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8386978cfd8f4de2adbc9373628606da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I got turned into a leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but what does
it even matter since I couldn't film it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I mean...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]did it even really happen?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8386978cfd8f4de2adbc9373628606da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what's with the face?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did I say
something weird?
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="5d9b6ab1ef0d406bb8bb94563b711b83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You wanna know about me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm a super-
amazing streamer![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I really POP on the
screen, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]you know?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5d9b6ab1ef0d406bb8bb94563b711b83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what's with the look?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I POP like
bubbles,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I'm not afraid to say it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="6d3a89615af2480ca60b14f66189339d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I've been walking around aimlessly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] trying
to find good content...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and it's USELESS![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3a89615af2480ca60b14f66189339d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Not only am I tired but I've got nothing![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Zero good footage.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3a89615af2480ca60b14f66189339d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]C'mon,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] think...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What would do the trick?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]trick?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ooo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a TRICK![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3a89615af2480ca60b14f66189339d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]That's it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] A trickâ€”a PRANK![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll pull a prank
on some Pikmin!
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="5343b8524a4643bb8c176383d454d68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]That [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's SO smart,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] which is
super charming,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you think?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5343b8524a4643bb8c176383d454d68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]All that stuff he talks about...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]it sounds
very intellectual.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Which makes him POP
like bubbles,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you ask me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5343b8524a4643bb8c176383d454d68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And those glasses he wears?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Love![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I want them on MY face![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] now!
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="28bf09dfce5c4439b0bbb50a049a9dd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know I can teach you how to
shoot awesome vids,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28bf09dfce5c4439b0bbb50a049a9dd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Now, don't say you're not interested.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Just hear me out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28bf09dfce5c4439b0bbb50a049a9dd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]First, hold your camera up high and tilt it
down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is how you make yourself POP![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Next, hit your face with a bit of light...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28bf09dfce5c4439b0bbb50a049a9dd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you even listening?!
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="1b6d612448dc40e2876665311a436ee5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So, heeey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the gear that the Rescue Corps
uses...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] created that stuff,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1b6d612448dc40e2876665311a436ee5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I guess he's basically a genius?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm sure he's gotta be a real gadget guru,
or something!
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="847ecc12aea642fca23fb3f6b8acbe0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've been trying to do some things that are
trending.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I even made an unmanned
rocket this one time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="847ecc12aea642fca23fb3f6b8acbe0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I pulled an all-nighter building it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I was
actually able to launch it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] though...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="847ecc12aea642fca23fb3f6b8acbe0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]It exploded as soon as it was in the sky!
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="81ff0037421c426c9e1e4564105965b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So you know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I started streaming for a
good reason.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ff0037421c426c9e1e4564105965b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]All those folks you see on the streams...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
they're always smiling.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You ever notice
that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wanted that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's OK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ff0037421c426c9e1e4564105965b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't mean to make you sad![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's keep this between you
and me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="43ae7d23891b4f7f9c270d80e5c08144" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Looking around,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see all sorts of stuff I
don't really understand.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="43ae7d23891b4f7f9c270d80e5c08144" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think now's a good time to get
out there and explore some more![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="43ae7d23891b4f7f9c270d80e5c08144" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Ha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Just joking![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll be on my best behavior
and stick around here.
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="f12775e7a37140d392ec0098ec2c64b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] always looks like he's got everything
so totally...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]together.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Awww,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and he's sooo
charismatic too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f12775e7a37140d392ec0098ec2c64b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I just wish I could get to know him better.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
If my camera wasn't busted,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd try to
capture some of that charm of his.
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="24ec7628e6d7437db3d5541e991f235d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Folks say my content is weird.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't
even know WHAT they're talking about.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Personally, I think my stuff POPS.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="24ec7628e6d7437db3d5541e991f235d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]What kind of content do I do?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] one
of my things is that I ask random folks to
splash water on me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's hilarious![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="24ec7628e6d7437db3d5541e991f235d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You don't get why that pops?![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Seriously?
LF006.LF006_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf07"/][UE:Meta key="36bfedd55967432a8a0c2755b151818a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]OK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so here's the MOST important thing...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Have as much fun as you can as often
as you can![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="36bfedd55967432a8a0c2755b151818a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]If you don't have fun,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can't make your
viewers or yourself smile.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And no smiles
is NO good.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Seriously.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="36bfedd55967432a8a0c2755b151818a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't get me wrongâ€”you can be serious a
little bit just for variety,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but looking like
you're having fun is where it's at.
